title: ===Mages with cc, some burst and good poke===

replies.body:
{{champion:7}}  and {{champion:99}}  have some good poke, although LB's burst is disgustingly good.

{{champion:268}} , {{champion:103}}  and {{champion:112}}  or pretty standard god-like mage mid-laners.
Syndra is the god of mid lane, pick her.

Yeah {{champion:112}}  is the bomb is you want to make an impact in team flights while still havign some insane poke.....
his Gravity well can literally lock off enemies from team fights or stun the entire team depending on use and circumstance... his burst combo is very high but like veigar he is generally played as a glass cannon...

Best of luck
well nidalee doesnt have cc but a great poke if u are good at skill shots, she has burst in her cougar form and a gank protection (her traps)
Most mages have some form of CC and then theres things like playstyle that make it hard to suggest because what one person likes another hates
A mage that has good poke, cc and burst could be someone like {{champion:268}}  or {{champion:103}} .........( I dont play them much but a lot of people have been telling me that they're good
